content.detailedDescription: I am on terrace for fresh then i sudden saw a moving object in the sky i was shocked it was moved very fastly it was looked like a star but star are constant so firstly i was shocked when i try to comunicate with mufon then many times i try to submit my ufo file but i can't submit such a type of error create and i think future human being will became alien for us

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on my balcony with my partner. i was sitting facing the mountains and he was facing me. behind him a fireball flashed past, very close, and disappeared behind a tree. at first i thought it was a meteor. but the object was so close. literally feet away from us. the object was only visible for a few seconds. it glowed red and orange and had a white misty tail. it was directly behind my partner and he did not witness it. i was not afraid of this object. it was just very odd. it is not the first time i have seen a fireball like object but it has been a very long time. first experience since moving to colorado.
thankyou
s
content.summary: Small fireball with trail passed directly in front of me. fireball was approx 20 ft from the ground.

content.detailedDescription: The event took place in district park, next to energy australia stadium in broadmeadow nsw at 19:40 aest. while i was jogging in the park, i looked up at a 70 degree angle in a ne direction where a moving yellowish light shone at me and caught my attention. i stopped jogging, removed my earphones and stood there to observe this strange light. the stars were yet to be visible and the moon was large and bright. i was more aware of the sky that night because i knew the space station was going to be visible at approximately 20:10 aest. i have previously observed satellites and the space station, this was neither. at first i thought it was a helicopter as the westpac rescue helipad is right next to the park. when i realised there was no sound, i became more concerned. the light was rotating from left to right in sporadic motion while moving up and down as though searching or observing. when the light was directly above me i could see the light positioned on the side of a matte black disc object approximately 40 metres in diameter and at a height of approximately 250 metres. i became terrified and fearful for my safety. the object continued on a general path of approximately 60 km/h towards se direction, although moving in a jolted and intermittent motion. at 20:10 aest the space station rolled across the sky as expected.
content.summary: Disc shaped object with a bright light attached, seemed to sporadically rotate from left to right in a horizontal motion, while moving in a jagged path.

content.detailedDescription:
1. in elverum ,walking with my dog!

content.summary: It was a wery collor shifting and it goes fast ,wery fast!!

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home when my wife called on her way home from work. in the middle of our conversation, she remarked about an object in the sky and was really scared, wondering what it was. she described it as a light in the sky changing colors and that many people had pulled over on the street to observe. i asked her where she was exactly and she had just exited the 101 freeway at reseda and turned northbound when she saw it. she told me she wanted to take pictures so we ended the call. about 15 minutes later, she arrived home and i said i wanted to see it for myself. she directed me to go down reseda blvd. (from our nearest cross street of vanowen). within 5 minutes i was on reseda blvd. and when i approached victory blvd., i could see the light off in the distance (about a mile south of me) near the 101 freeway. the light was maybe about 15 degrees above the horizon at that point. it appeared to hover left and right from about 50 feet to the east of reseda blvd. to about the centerline of the street. it would climb and descend randomly and was changing colors every few seconds. as i waited at the bus lane intersection red light by oxnard/reseda, the object seemed to dip lower on its descents than before, to the point where it disappeared from view before reappearing as it ascended again. it would consistently do this on the east side of its loops. it was difficult to tell if it was dipping behind the freeway or some trees to the north of the freeway. at this point, at its apex the object would ascend to maybe 30 degrees above the horizon from my position. given the distance from victory to oxnard and the relative change in the objects position in the sky, i'm sure there is a way to calculate its actual altitude. as i approached hatteras, the object disappeared for the last time and i went ahead past the freeway to see if i could reacquire sight of it, but couldn't find it again. i drove around for maybe another 10 minutes or so around the neighborhood and no trace of it.

i returned home and my wife and i decided to head back down to the area we had last seen it to see if we could find it again. at this point, maybe an hour had passed since my initial call with her when she had spotted the object. it was basically our first chance to discuss what she had seen and she said it had gotten low enough for her to see it was a huge disc, but too thin for anyone to be onboard. we decided to drive south on reseda to go up the hill south of ventura blvd for a better vantage point. seeing nothing but the normal flight traffic to burbank and van nuys, we headed back down. as we approached ventura blvd heading north on reseda, we saw a massive object with a persistent green light at the center and alternating red lights about 40 feet to either side, which seemed like it was from a plane. this was unusual and caught our attention for three reasons. first, it was extremely low. it approached us from the north straight ahead and banked east over the 101 freeway. we turned east on ventura blvd to follow a parallel path as it wasn't traveling very fast. however, it did occasionally pass behind the buildings along ventura, indicating a very low altitude. secondly, it was silent. i didn't hear any jet or prop noise even though it couldn't have been more than 1500 feet away. we lost it near white oak as it seemed to pick up speed and disappear to the east. the third strange thing about this craft was the color and pattern of its lights. if it were a regular airplane, which we see all the time due to our proximity to burbank and van nuys airports, they should have had a more rapid blink to them. instead, the alternating red lights were on for about a second before switching off. also, a plane at that altitude would be in the process of landing, but no landing lights were on.
content.summary: Bright light that changed colors circling a small area while ascending and descending.

content.detailedDescription: My father and i were just sitting on the recliner watching the simpsons when suddenly we both see a flash of light. i am at the right angle to see 3 white glowing orbs that form an exact triangle. a second later i ask my dad if he saw that, he said yes then i knew i was not seeing things. i saw one more orb after the first 3 a second or  2'or 3 after that. then my dad went to the door and said he saw some white squiggles with a blue glow. the whole ordeal lasted about 10 seconds. i will never forget it, we were both completely shocked by what we saw. and the whole sighting was just a flash..Then it was gone.
content.summary: Very short, triangle of orbs observed. and trail of white/blue squiggles after in opposite direction.

content.detailedDescription:
Wed 5 nov 2014, 12 noon.. 13 miles east of myrtle point oregon, from my front porch i observed to the west a very short, very bright, very colorfull rainbow with what apeared to be a bright light source behind it.. if you tape a toothpick across the center of a nickel and hold it at arms length with the toothpic at 1 o'clock 7 o'clock, that will give you a size.. the small 'rainbow' effect would vary in size and brightness but the vividness of the colors are like nothing i've seen short of neon.. the bright light source itself remained pretty constant slowly varying from orbish to crescent'ish shaped.. 
my wife and i observed this for over 20 mins and it never moved in the sky, the object remained completely stationary while seeming to cause a disturbence or vapor trail in the clouds as the clouds passed by the object, not the object through the clouds..... i took several pics at 2 to 3 mins apart and this effect shows pretty clear..
i am retired coast guard and merchant marines and have spent half of my adult life at sea standing watches at all hours and in all weathers, i have never seen anything like this in the sky before in my life..
[names removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Large stationary bright prismatic seemed to cause vapor trial in light clouds as "they" passed by it.. many pics...

content.detailedDescription: We were on our way to work and i told my friend to stop the car because i want to take a picture of the sun as my habit of starting my busy week. when i checked the picture, i told him, i dont want to post it because its not a nice shot, then i noticed something just above the sun, when you're not using zoom, it looks like an orb so i zoomed it and it shocked me as it has like white spikes. so i let my friend see and he told me to take another picture, on the next picture, it is still there but its moving to the left direction. i took some pictures again thinking maybe its just a reflection or my camera lens. then my friend took a picture too in his mobile because i'm really not believing that its there, so he took a picture and he was surprised because its there too. i tried looking at it through my eyes but the rays of the sun is so bright. i told him maybe its the moon, or maybe its a drone or a satellite. i'm very skeptical about these things and i just want to know and be enlightened about this weird phenomenon. please note that the attached in the attached photo, you can see the object in the first photo just above the sun, then it goes to the left on the succeeding ones.
content.summary: I randomly took a picture of the sun as my habit to start the day. when i checked, i saw a weird round image just above it.

content.detailedDescription: I came home this weekend from college to visit my parents. i realized i left my phone at my house in bloomington so i decided to run to cvs real quick. cvs is about a mile or so away from my house and closes at 10pm. i left around 9:50pm, heading east. on my way back home, west, a little more than halfway back, i noticed a bright gold/copper/orange light that was stationary. it was about the level of the tree tops nearby. there were almost no stars present in the sky tonight so i kept my eye on the light. at first site of the light i immediately thought it was a ufo, as i always do. usually i am debunked shortly after a sighting but things were surprisingly different this time. i continued driving towards the light & it disappeared from my view behind the trees for a moment. once i passed these trees, where houses begin along the road, i could see the light again. being closer now, i could see there was more than just one light. at this point i grabbed my phone and called my best friend. i pulled my car into a driveway, now facing north. it was the 3rd or 4th driveway past the trees, about 7 or 8 houses before reaching mine. all of the lights were stationary and were not blinking. there were 4 of them in a diamond formation and were literally almost directly over my car. i couldn't stop staring. i could kind of see a diamond shaped outline and then i noticed another set of 4 lights, in the exact same formation exhibiting the same effects, about 50 feet to the left of the craft above me. these two objects seemed to me, to be way too close to each other to be airplanes or helicopters. i was freaking out to my friend on the phone. i kept telling him i wanted to get out of the car and that i should hangup and take a picture. after getting off the phone i, instead, got scared and didn't feel like i should stay that close any longer. i put my car in reverse and sped down the street, to my house. i ran inside to get my dad. i thought he would want to see what i had just witnessed. we got in the car and i tried to show him but the objects had vanished. we drove around the area for about 10 minutes but only saw a helicopter to the south, moving west. we knew it was a helicopter because of the blue, red, & orange lights and because they were blinking. my dad proceeded to tell me that we don't live in the right area to have ufo sightings, but i have also had two extremely vivid abduction dreams within the past 7 years. this was the most real thing i have experienced. i wish i had known about this site earlier so i could more accurately report these dreams/possible abductions i have experienced. if there are other ufo cases that have occurred in my area i would really like to be informed about them. thank you. i hope this story helps.
content.summary: Hovering craft almost directly above my car

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight is a clear, almost windless night in palm beach gardens...My wife was sitting on the porch and asked me to come out and see something...She pointed to the northwest and asked me "what is that?"...She was pointing at a green and red pulsing uuuhhhh something just hovering...At first i thought it was a helicopter at about 2000 feet..But then it started moving almost in a square pattern as if it was looking for something......For awhile it was directly north of us before it went back to it's original position..I realized it wasn't a helicopter because it was moving too fast and stopping on a dime without slowing down...And it was making 90 degree angle turns...At one point it started descending...At first i thought it was moving away but it wasn't because it shot back up to it's original position...I'd say it got down to about 500 feet...But please understand i'm guessing altitudes...What i can tell you is we live under the landing pattern to palm beach international airport and i know when we see planes going overhead around here they're at 4000 feet and this thing seemed lower...
this went on for about 10 minutes..At least it was 10 minutes from the time my wife first caught sight of it...No idea how long it was there before she saw it...
eventually it started moving to the west...And now it was darting pretty fast and doing those 90 degree turns...Repeating what seemed to be it's "search" pattern...When it was directly west of us it began a slow descent and eventually disappeared from our view behind a tree...
what got me was how fast it moved from one point in the sky to the other...No sense of acceletation...Or of slowing down...Just darted and stopped...
it wasn't a helicopter..It wasn't a plane...I've never seen a drone and have no idea if they move like that...
my wife and i both know what we saw...We're curious if anyone else from around here saw it...
this is something my wife nor i have ever seen before...
what was it?
by the way i knew it was 10:15 pm when i went out to the porch because i was watching bill maher and he's just introduced his panel...And i was a bit annoyed with my wife at first because i wanted to watch that program....
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering over palm beach gardens then moved around, 90 degree turns...

content.detailedDescription:
My husband, son and i - as well as numerous other people around here - have been seeing some weird lights in the sky.  

about 2 weeks ago, we were on our deck (which faces west) about 7:30 pm and something bright and flashing caught our eye.  we looked through binoculars and whatever it was, it was flashing red-yellow-blue.  we walked up on our hill, and it was moving back and forth - we used a house on another hill to gauge the location.  we tried using the telescope, but no luck.  we were puzzled - and got cold, so we went back in the house.    

a few nights later, we were on our front porch (faces east) about 7:30 - 8:00 pm and saw the flashing light again.  again, we looked through binoculars and saw the same thing.  again, we were puzzled, but got cold, so we went in the house.    

the next night, november 3, we went out to look again, and sure enough, it was there.  (same time) i tried taking videos, but when i published it to the computer, you can't tell that much of anything is there.  i did put a post on facebook - as well as contact my neighbors.  my neighbors went out and saw it too.  some people on facebook posted that they saw it as well.  of course, some people insisted that we were seeing something else - the blimp from the steeler game (no way we could see the blimp in pittsburgh from our house in belle vernon!  people from belle vernon to bentleyville to smithton saw the flashing lights.)  some said that it was the lights from fox's pizza, about 2 miles away reflecting off of an inversion.  (that pizza shop has been there for quite some time, yet we have never seen this before.  not to mention that they do not have a "bat signal" light on top of their roof - they only have lights around their windows.)  others said that it was a satellite.  (we star gaze sometimes and have seen satellites.  satellites move.  fast.  this did not.)  my cousin said that it could be a star.  (i wouldn't think a star would be in the west, and then just a week later, be at the front of our house at around the same time in the evening!)  i just don't know!  my husband drug our son's telescope down, and he had a heck of a time getting it locked on to the light.  when he finally did, he said that the lights seemed to be in an octagon-ish shape, flashing around the outside.  (i tried to look, but clumsy me bumped the legs and i didn't get to see it.)    

that night, when we were going to bed, we noticed the same bright flashing light out of our bathroom window, so we went back outside.  this video that i attached was taken at about 12:30 at night.  there is a house across the road from us, and directly above the house were 3 lights in a vertical line.  there were two of these flashing things on either side of that line.  (i wasn't able to capture both of them in the same frame.)  we were very puzzled about there being two of them!  but once again, we got cold and went back in the house.  

but regardless, whatever it is, it's out there again tonight.
content.summary: It pulsates and moves to the left, while stars move to the right.  first night we saw it in the west.  now it's more east.

content.detailedDescription: I walked quickly to warehouse to ask some one to come out and see what i had seen, he did come out but object was gone.
content.summary: Looked up at sky and saw very bright object.

content.detailedDescription: Was looking east at a plane shooting chem trails and all of a sudden i see a tiny craft above the plane at a very very high altitude.First i thought the craft was a satellite but it couldn't have been the sun was still up.The object was traveling very slow going west i new it was a plane and i couldn't have been a helicopter after a couple of minutes the object was going higher and higher i was losing the object and it was clear a day nothing in the sky no clouds nothing.The object had a shiny reflection cause it was going to the sun. it was viable for about 5 minutes.
content.summary: A  craft suddenly appearing near plane

content.detailedDescription: Pulled over to get something from back of car at 41 and 116 routes. saw lights and grabbed camera. only got last light as it disappeared. it showed again a few miles to east. got in car to drive south when it appeared. stopped to get video and friends phone. trying to figure out how to get video online but we are not tech savey. one light appeared and then a line of lights lit up and moved together. each light disappeared one by one and then it appeared the same way again two more times within a five mile radius in various directions.I was shaken as i have never seen anything like that. i looked for it again and asked some folks at the gas station if they saw it over them and they laughed.
content.summary: Seven or more round lights in a row

content.detailedDescription: That evening i saw a glowing light from my house windows. the base color of the object was red light and it was also flashing yellow and green light after same time interval. there is a river and mountains behind my building site and i saw the object probably on the upper sky of the river. the object was not only changing its path but it was also hovering for few minutes. i started filming the object and also showed it to my wife. i guess the object immediately noticed it and disappeared behind the buildings.
content.summary: It was a glowing light of red yellow and green color

content.detailedDescription: It looks like my old friend are back again, i had a very weard dream abput the blond hair, dark eyed ones.   by the way theent a message to all of you, "you keep getting nostraums last pictures and notes wrong, maybe you should ask her or ne of the others we left for you?"and then they said "leave south dacota alone, were not their".  i noticed that the heat in the room went up to 75 degrease.  iwoke up feeling like i had lost two days, but i knew i was okay.  every time this happens these blond haired dark eyed people seem more like friends????   bye, the way they said, "stil haven't found that sub off green land, or the plan that was heading towards asia, you wont", "we are here, zu".
content.summary: Lift a pin prickmy fiingure!

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were walking out the back door of the house to go to the store. as i walked up to stick my key in the door i realized it was very bright outside from the moon(the only reason i looked up). right away i saw a single bright white light, i thought it might be a sattelite, i turned and said to my girlfriend, "hey do you see that?" right as i said that i noticed multiple bright lights coming from the east towards the moon where i was looking, i screamed at my girlfriend "holy s**t, do you see those!" at first about three popped out behind cloud cover and the quickly grouped closer together, then about 5 after that came together, then multiple bunches of 3-5 with some single lights maneuvering around the sky, some were going straight, some were zig zagging and making quick turns to join with groups and so on, all while heading east to west out towards the pacific coast. after the group went by, a single two turbine jet flew past, possibly trying to follow or catch them, i don't know.
content.summary: At least 40, solid white light objects, zig zagging and grouping headed out towards the coast.

content.detailedDescription: Started on oct 27,2014 during solar flare event i took several pictures in four days,first set of pictures i decided to take was because the sun was so close and bright very hot and strange burning smell.Went on nasa web page and saw solar flares was high.Radio and cable channels messing up so i decided i. got to. take photos of this.First set of photos i took 5 pictures in minute went inside to look at them and by the sun was a round white object thought could be a planet but when i look at time for 5 piucs object moved back and fourth.Then went outside took more off the sun flare moved in and out. happened from oct 27 to nov 1 of 2014.Today is nov 7 around 2pm i'm goin to take morre pictures of the sun.In the south when event happened, i want to know anyone else see this specially oct 27 when sun wasclose and very bright if anyone smelled weird burning smell.I ask someone who was walking down my street if he noticed the sun like i did without saying anything he told me same things bout it.Also want professionals looks at my pictures to let me know was it a planet or something else.There is around 30 pictures.Blow them up yourselfs to see what i see.Mufon i. was only able too put 5 pictures if you find evidence of something other than a planet i have. total of 30 or more pictures for 6 days.Goin take more today just to compare the sun from today and week ago.Thank you
content.summary: During days of solar flares sev. pictures.Object would move when i snap 5 pics in 1 min.I need ur expect opionon.

it only showed up in the photo.It appears to have a strange pattern of crossed grey lines and is emitting a dark grey trail from it.Or the dark grey trail could be the object and the white part the trail,not sure
but indeed a strange photo.

content.detailedDescription: I was on break at work outside. i normally look in the sky at night for planets and satellites. i am an avid watcher and know difference between normal and not. this was a life changing experience. i have seen countless craft in past including a near abduction by a triangular craft with a friend in woods when younger. this was like a scene from pearl harbor. i first saw 3 craft appear from over edge of building. i originally had thought it was iss or css. i thought it was weird that they were following each other. i even joked to myself that the chinese were chasing us for secrets. but then i saw the fourth come over the building roof. i was speechless. i didnt notice the other two at first. i was so caught up in the 4 lights. then.................I saw the first wave come over the roof line. i was so scared, i was almost frozen. i only put an estimate of 50 craft in my report, but it may have been 100. there was so many. they were spread over about and covered 40% of the entire horizon. that is when i noticed the other 2 leading craft. they went directly overhead and made a slight change in path to northeast. these 6 craft were leading the pact which were clearly following. the front 6 were about 2 to maybe 3 times as big as the others. normally i see the smaller ones, but they are doing figure 8's and such, these were flying straight, but slightly moving back and forth as if fluid in motion. i would guess they were very high in sky. i cant give good estimate, but i think maybe atleast 30,000 feet. they seemed higher than a jet plane. but i cant be sure. i try to estimate size by using the iss which i see regularly and would say they were like 2/3 size. i was sitting in my car when i saw the first 3 craft. then when i saw the fourth i got out. and i said [item moved/cms/nd] i got out and was walking around in parking lot yelling  [item moved/cms/nd] . there was 2 co workers inside i wanted to run and get, but i was so scared to lose sight of them. i was already late to return but watched then for a few more minutes. the whole event was about 6 minutes.Then i had to go back to work. when i went in the door, they were still going over but they had thinned out. i wouldn't even make report but this was huge and a major event. i have seen a few great sightings, but this was spectacular
content.summary: 6 larger leading craft followed by dozens of smaller craft came from the south and passed overhead. it was like pearl harbor. invasion

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I saw them while walking my dog around 10:30pm. there were two hovering over the lake another was hovering over a hotel it looked like(they were on the opposite side of the lake). the way the lights flashed maybe could pass as airplane lights but i'm well versed with airplanes and helicopters and they weren't it. when i would try to video tape it it was like they turned on an invisiblity cloak or something....It was a very erie feelin. especially given how close i am to nasa (across the street from my neighborhood) and ellington field which is about 5 miles from me. 

the knowledge i have with aircrafts are from my grandfather who is a pilot and marine vet, my brother who is in the air force and just the fact that i've lived my whole life near and around planes.

if y'all have a way to inhance the visibility i have a couple more videos i can show...
content.summary: Saw two hovering over the kemah area and three others almost like servaying the lake shores

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)

content.detailedDescription: Hanging out with a friend.  a erratic light was moving down the road.  never saw the source of the light.  emitted bright white light that shined on trees and hill in front of my house.  first noticed it moving down the road.   incredibly silent.  as it moved pay my yard a quietly suggest we go check it out. to wick my friend not so quietly replied [item moved/cms/nd]  and then it shot through the woods incredibly fast.  still moving erratically and all that was left was our goosebumps.    told a few people.  no way we both hallucinate.  stone cold sober.  well.....2 nights ago a different friends son saw this. and described it pretty well to the t. lives about 6 miles away in same rural area in nc..... what was that?
content.summary: Strange light seem by 4 people over course of 2 years.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work one sunday morning approximately 6:40am. as i entered the city limits and approached the interstate entrance ramp, i noticed a bright object in the sky that seemed to be flying over the interstate. my first thought was of course this was a plane. from a distance it seemed to have a few different colored lights, but it was just unusually bright. i tried to keep my sight on the object as i drove, but as i got closer, the weirder it looked. it no longer looked as if it had multi-colored lights, all i seen was this bright white light. the object also seemed to be only hovering over the highway now and appeared to be changing shapes while it was somehow rotating. at one point it actually looked worm-like. i was struggling to figure out what i was seeing. the scariest part was i think this was somewhat close to the ground, but that also meant the craft itself couldn't have been too big. i estimate it to be the size of a car maybe, i'm not sure. i just know it wasn't as high as a plane would be and this looked nothing at all like one anyways. it felt as if my heart just stopped as i was trying to figure out what this was, to make sense of it before i couldn't see it anymore. now appeared to be triangular or prism shaped, which seemed strange from what i seen earlier. just as i spoke to myself,"what the hell is that?", the craft appeared to abruptly turn around. at this point i can definitely see a clear, bright white triangular shape as it starting slowly flying in the opposite direction. it was such a bright white, all over as if it were glowing. there were no blinking lights i should have stopped my car, even on the interstate, but i didn't want to be that close to it honestly. it was right after that it just wasn't in view anymore, it was now behind me as i was driving. i just wish i had a picture or a video. there were other people that were out on the interstate and in the city that had to have seen this as well. i kept checking to see if anyone had filed a report with someone, even with the media. i can't find one, so i'm gonna submit one in hopes of reaching out to someone else that might have seen this or can explain what it was. i'd like to know, i would feel better if there could be some rational explanation.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I felt scared, amazed, and anxious after viewing this. would feel better if i knew what it was.

content.detailedDescription:
To those who this concerns.

today 11/6/2014  this morning around 9:50 i saw this plane fly over my house. flying really fast. so i went out side and took a picture of the plane also today my friend matthew called and asked me if i saw this plane fly over my house and i told him i did. so then he begain describing the direction of the planes flight to me matthew told me that the plane was flying over his house them hoverd turned and flew away from house. this afternoon i was up a churh here in belton,mo and now there were two of the same plane flying over the church going towards kansas city. then this evening i saw this helicopter flying over my house and trailing behind it was this orb of something it wasn't a plane it was like a ball like figure. 

the pictures below are the one of the plane i saw at9:50 this moring and the other is what i saw tonight the date of this again was 11/6/2014

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i was going to the gas station on 11/3/14 it was 11:20 pm when i seen a strange light hovering i told my wife she was looking at it too so we went on another road to get a better view when the one light object split into two and then i started recording the 1 light stage stationary while the second light moved around it up and down and side to side i only got 2 minutes of video the one light went out and it kinda look like a plane with blinking lights the other lights stay there and then did the same thing and then a third light came on.I have seen many different a ufo's here in idaho i see a lot of activity between june through august in the skiesand they have seen different shapes and lights this is just the first time i have decided to submit something
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a strange light wall going to the gas station so i recorded it don't know what it is

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were driving down a street to a local store one evening. not positive if it was spring or summer, all i remember was that it was warm out. i looked out the window of the car and noticed a large bright orb over a field on our way to the store. it looked like a large star, but it couldn't have been, because it was the early evening. it was too large to be a star. i watched it as we drove past, and can recall it wasn't moving. just staying in one spot with no signs of movement. i thought it was really strange when i saw it, because if it was a plane, or even an asteroid, it'd be moving at least a little bit, right? it didn't move at all while i was watching. it was over a year ago, so i don't remember everything, including the exact date and time, although it must have been around 7 pm since my family has dinner at 6 pm, and we went after dinner. i believe it was still there when we were going home less than an hour later, but didn't really catch my attention the second time. still in the same spot.
content.summary: Bright orb hovering over field.

content.detailedDescription: Caught on trail cam hovering need address can send photos plus videos og other phenomenon object cigar shape 30 ft long  light bars in rear
content.summary: Cayght by trail cam from 30 ft still photo

content.detailedDescription: During a routine patrol in rc south under command of centcom space command, my unit and i observed a small pill shaped cylindrical craft hovering utilizing some unknown form of reaction less drive system. after hovering above a small ridge it generated a form of light lending effect and disappeared from sight. a report was filed to military hq. a word of mouth directive from an unknown air force o6 was issued to my men and myself not to disclose this info. i hold a ph.D in physics and my knowledge of terrestrial technology is beyond question. this was a man shaped object that emitted no noise and was capable of controlled flight.
content.summary: Non terrestrial aerial craft seen hovering for several minutes before rapid acceleration
